nodes.text: The Sinsang system was a star system located in the galaxy. It was in close proximity to the Outer Rim world of Dantooine and the Angor system.

The Sinsang system was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in the thirty-seventh issue of De Agostini's Star Wars: Build the Millennium Falcon magazine, published around September 16, 2015. The star system was first mentioned in the Star Wars Legends continuity in The Essential Atlas, a 2009 reference book authored by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace.
